articles.title: Can the R2 Really Save Rivian Automotive?
articles.mainIdea: Can the R2 Really Save Rivian Automotive?
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Can the R2 Really Save Rivian Automotive?. Rivian Automotive (NASDAQ:RIVN) is betting its future on the R2, a midsize electric SUV scheduled to enter production in the first half of 2026. Priced at approximately $45,000 before any incentives, the R2 is designed to reach a much broader audience than Rivianâ€™s current premium R1 lineup, which starts above $70,000.
